ComicInfo.Summary: The stunning conclusion to the first SWORD OF DRACULA miniseries, "The Elders!" Dracula, King of Vampires, has summoned an army of zombies to attack the Fallen Angels who have taken over Dallas. But if he prevails, how can Ronnie Van Helsing keep him from turning his terrible wrath on the people of Earth? Are we all destined to fall under the Sword of Dracula?
